title: Sanjeev Mehta quits Standard Chartered Bank, set to launch new venture
description: Sanjeev Mehta has resigned as Standard Chartered Bank's Managing Director and Head of Transaction Banking Sales for South Asia after a 17-year tenure. Mehta, who left the bank in July, plans to start a new greenfield venture.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
